4. Documentation, metadata: you also describe how you document and organize your research materials for your own use, how will you find and understand your data, notes etc when you are writing your thesis, are you using a reference manager such as zotero (www.zotero.org/)? 
7. Sharing: Is all the information, data, code etc needed to verify and reproduce your data in the publication already? If not you can use KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) to make this available.
